== Aroor (CT) (628215) ==

Aroor (CT) is a town in the [[Cherthala ]] taluka of [[Alappuzha]] district with an area of 15.04 sq. km. and harbouring 9449 households with total population of 39214 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Alappuzha]] is at a distance of 45 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 202 km. Male population is 19431 and female population is 19783. Scheduled Caste population is 4378 and Scheduled Tribes population is 184. Census Location Code of the town is 628215<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Alappuzha (m + og) at a distance of 45 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 55 km. Railway station is at Aroor at a distance of 0 km.
